definition: to have no cares/to be carefree
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: A long time ago, a man unencumbered own good uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，自己一個人無牽無掛，好不自在。

sentences.english: My carefree days are over, I fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我的無牽無掛的日子已經過去了。

sentences.english: Care free, they roam leisurely in the space.
sentences.chinese: 它們閒遊在太空，無牽無掛。

sentences.english: JK: Yeah, you guys are just homeless team.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，你們是一個無牽無掛的團隊。
